pageContext.claim: “Had a very good and interesting meeting at the White House with A.G. Sulzberger, Publisher of the New York Times. Spent much time talking about the vast amounts of Fake News being put out by the media & how that Fake News has morphed into phrase, “Enemy of the People.” Sad!”
pageContext.analysis: Sulzberger immediately disputed Trump's version of the meeting, saying that he told the president that the phrase "enemy of the people" was putting the lives of journalists in danger.
